snippet: One by one, the relatives of Matt Shaw, a young man gunned down last year while on a trip home from college, stood up in a courtroom to speak to his killer.
abstract: Relatives of Matt Shaw, young man gunned down in Harlem in 2012 while on trip home from college, stand up in courtroom to speak to his killer, Khalid Rahman, at formal sentencing hearing.
lead_paragraph: One by one, the relatives of Matt Shaw, a young man gunned down last year while on a trip home from college, stood up in a courtroom to speak to his killer.

headline.main: A Killer Hears About What Could Have Been
headline.print_headline: A Killer Hears About What Could Have Been
